entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 09:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: WSW 36 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
